title: Changelog
description:
You can check the changelog any time in Settings option

NOTE: If you have problem with the app, please CREATE AN ISSUE in GitHub, because I need information to check and fix it.

For search results mismatches, please contact to https://github.com/soruly/trace.moe

changes.description: Design for search result detail popup
Search by url with new method
Only load data for quota per minute. Quota per day no more
Server to load images after search results
